attributes.action: Free dental treatment for diabetics regardless of their yearly income
attributes.additional_details: Although there is help for most people in place via the health certificate . I personally still can't afford treatment due to my partner earning to much. Diabetic patients should get free treatment dispite the earnings of the spouse especially if they have no savings .
attributes.background: Many diabetics have lost their teeth. Or problems with gum disease due to glucose sugars and poor management of teeth/diabetes.
